channel.title: Need Help with making my first server
channel.description:
Alright, I have Jdk, and all the requirements. I downloaded Fr33sc4p3 pkz file, I go and click on the compile.bat or whatever, and then I press 'C' wait a bit, then this error message comes up. What do I do?
[IMG]http://img352.imageshack.us/img352/6654/compilegi8.png[/img]
I really wanna get this server up asap. Yet I don't want to rush it, so could somebody please help me?

item.title: Need Help with making my first server
item.dc:creator: @ludapwnzu ludapwnzu
item.description:
@ludapwnzu wrote:

Okey dokey, u have no real problems there. The first error that you thought was an error is not an error. You want it to say that. When you have added something to ur server and have done it wrong. The compiiler will give you a list of errors which you do not want to happen. In order to avoid that, make a backup copy of all the java files u are planning on editing just incase…

For your second “problem” it says that because u have opened 2 runserver.bat windows. If for some beserk reason that you cannot find the first runserver.bat that was opened , restart ur computer. Then this time… , make sure that you are only opening one runserver, or you wlil be confused, other then that your pretty ok

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help with making my first server

item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

[quote=“andrew1234321, post:3, topic:77635”]ok, ik i meant when i go to ‘runserver’

[/quote]

because u ran ur server twice u r only meant to have 1 runserver.bat file on u only need to run ur server once…

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help with making my first server
item.dc:creator: @andrew1234321 andrew1234321
item.description:
@andrew1234321 wrote:

so instead of making the firewall be the server name make it be named “private server”?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 09, 2007, 11:23:14 PM[/size][hr]Hmm I’ve tried a lot but nothing seems to be working :’(

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help with making my first server

item.title: Need Help with making my first server
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

That means your port that you allowed through firewall is being used. Go to where you made your port in exceptions tab in your firewall and make sure it is not being used. Name it private server or something like that…

Read full topic
